title: What is Go used for?
body:
Go is good for Stand-alone command-line apps or scripts Network and Web servers.

Go is not so good for Desktop or GUI-based apps.

Go is less good for System-level programming.

advantages-and-disadvantages-of-go-programming-language

open-source-go-projects-to-learn-from

Ref:

http://www.infoworld.com/article/2928602/google-go/whats-the-go-language-really-good-for.html
